abstract: Brooklyn Dist Atty Kenneth P Thompson declines to retry or appeal case of Shabaka Shakur, man who was granted new trial for double murder for which he has already served 27 years in prison; move means that Shakur could soon be released; Shakur's case was investigated by disgraced detective Louis Scarcella.
lead_paragraph: The case of Shabaka Shakur, who has served 27 years, was investigated by the retired detective Louis Scarcella, whose work has been under review by Brooklyn authorities.

headline.main: Prosecutor Won’t Retry Man Granted New Trial in Brooklyn Double Homicide
headline.print_headline: Prosecutor Won’t Retry Man Granted New Trial in 2 Killings

snippet: The case of Shabaka Shakur, who has served 27 years, was investigated by the retired detective Louis Scarcella, whose work has been under review by Brooklyn authorities.
